timeline.bodyText:
The /query/sql endpoint is full sql - SQL parser, sql execution and sql response format. I thought you are intending to have
/pql - full pql endpoint
/sql - sql execution, sql response, but pql parser.
In that case, we would need a query option in the /query/sql endpoint to switch between pql/sql parser.
And essentially, we are ending up with 3 modes,

full pql - /pql endpoint
partial sql with pql parser - default /sql endpoint
full sql - /sql endpoint, with query param
timeline.author: npawar

replies.bodyText: Current approach is to route SQL query from ui still to PQL endpoint, but with query options groupByMode=sql;responseFormat=sql.
